backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing orders with CRUD operations, payment confirmation updates, and status timeline tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an image‑update requirement for the Dilkhush founder photo and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and configs.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to keep the Android platform directory under version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app ID, name, web directory, HTTPS scheme, and Android build settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with OKLCH color variables, theming, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and script bootstrap for the React app.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Ads.txt file authorizing a specific Google AdSense publisher account.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, colors, icons, and app display settings.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Instructions for building the Android APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling navigation, orders, WhatsApp flow, admin mode, ads injection, and founder photo rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Admin APK download button that checks file availability before triggering download and shows an unavailable alert.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard showing order stats, filters, table view, order detail access, and logout plus APK download.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: PIN-based admin login modal validating a 4‑digit PIN before granting dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Order detail side panel with formatted info and controls to update order status via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: Provides admin UI controls for filtering orders by payment status and order status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Displays a table of orders with formatted fields, status badges, and a view-details action.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsHeadInjec: Injects the ad provider’s head script at runtime when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Renders a configured ad slot by mounting provider snippets when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsSettingsP: UI panel for owners to configure AdSense settings, validate snippets, and save them locally.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: Plate selection and quantity form that validates minimum order and submits createOrder to backend.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Reusable owner photo component with fallback image handling, size variants, and default Dilkhush founder image.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Modal for post‑order payment steps including UPI app launches, WhatsApp fallback links, and payment confirmation form handling.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Timed promotional popup showing a momo offer with session-based dismissal and an order callback.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Generic modal displaying text content with optional WhatsApp link opening and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ad config structures and helpers to generate AdSense head scripts and slot snippets.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Provides APK metadata and download URLs for customer and admin apps.
frontend/src/config/ownerPhotos.ts: Exports paths to founder images for use throughout the app.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Stores centralized business payment settings including UPI ID, delivery charge, and business name.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Tracks admin authorization state reactively based on URL hash and navigation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all admin orders when authorized, refreshing periodically.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdsConfig.ts: Combines stored settings and environment checks to produce the effective runtime ads configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a mutation hook to create orders via the backend actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth using Dfinity AuthClient, handling login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
Defines a react-query mutation to update an order's status through the backend actor and refresh the admin orders cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Implements a mutation for submitting payment confirmation details and invalidates the orders query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and utility animations for fade and zoom effects.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Implements admin access helpers using a PIN stored in the URL hash, with functions to read, validate, set, and clear the token.
frontend/src/lib/ads.ts: Utility for injecting third‑party ad provider scripts once and mounting/unmounting ad slot snippets safely in the DOM.
frontend/src/lib/adsenseSnippet.ts: Parses AdSense snippets to extract and validate a ca-pub client ID from various input formats.
frontend/src/lib/adsOwnerSettings.ts: Manages localStorage persistence, validation, and change notifications for AdSense owner settings.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Checks availability and triggers download of customer/admin APKs using HEAD requests and dynamic link creation.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum order rules for delivery and helper functions for related validation messages.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeEnvironment.ts: Detects whether the app is running in a Capacitor environment or a standard web browser.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Utilities for building UPI deep links, opening specific UPI apps (Paytm, Google Pay, generic), and copying payment links.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs against format and placeholder patterns and provides an error message for invalid VPAs.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links for order messages, payment confirmations, and screenshot requests, and opens them in new windows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, image replacement requirements, and pending feature requests.
